name: Pug Hunt
description:
Pug Hunt

Take a relaxing stroll through the wilderness and find some Pug friends.

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Pugs - Worth 500 points

Other Animals - Minus 1000 points

No end so just Alt+F4 when you have had a look!

Music by:

Cothi Howell (Nephew)

Rhys Howell (Brother In Law)

Assest By:

https://quaternius.com/

Time/Goals:

The plan was there would be a way to "spend" the pugs to scare the other animals to free up lanes but I did not manage to get around to it...

...HOWEVER...I will be continuing messing with this game as my nephew was very excited by it!

Thanks for the motivation HonestDan and the community xxx
